com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util

Interface LookupTable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLookupTable

    public interface LookupTable
    The LookupTable interface describes a mechanism for providing WComponents with data sourced from an application look-up table. Applications must implement this class and provide configure the Factory by setting the following parameter in the application's Configuration: factory.impl.com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.LookupTable=com.something.MyLookupTable
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getCacheKeyForTable(Object table)
      Retrieves the cache id for the given table.
      String getCode(Object table, Object entry)

      Retrieves the description for a given table entry, or null if the type of object is not supported.

    • Method Detail

      • getTable

        List<?> getTable(Object table)
        Retrieves the contents of a given table by a table identifier. This identifier can be any object appropriate to your application.
        Parameters:
        table - the table to look up.
        Returns:
        a list of table objects.

      • getCacheKeyForTable

        String getCacheKeyForTable(Object table)

        Retrieves the cache id for the given table. This is used to enable caching of data sets, including on the client.

        If your data sets are session- or user-specific, your cache id must include this information so that the cache is invalidated.

        A null return value indicates that the table is not cacheable.

        Parameters:
        table - the table to look up.
        Returns:
        the cache key for the given table, or null if the table is not cacheable.

      • getTableForCacheKey

        Object getTableForCacheKey(String key)
        Retrieves the source table for the cache key.
        Parameters:
        key - the table's cache key, as returned by getCacheKeyForTable(Object).
        Returns:
        the table to lookup.

      • getCode

        String getCode(Object table,
             Object entry)
        Retrieves the code for a given table entry, or null if the type of object is not supported.
        Parameters:
        table - the source table
        entry - the table entry.
        Returns:
        the code for the given entry.

      • getDescription

        String getDescription(Object table,
                    Object entry)
        Retrieves the description for a given table entry, or null if the type of object is not supported.
        Parameters:
        table - the source table.
        entry - the table entry.
        Returns:
        the description for the given entry.
